HeroSection.description: Comprehensive real estate financial planning platform. Turn your property dreams into achievable financial plans with intelligent calculations and market insights.

FeaturesSection.heading: Everything You Need to Succeed
FeaturesSection.description: Powerful financial planning tools designed to help you buy, invest, and grow your real estate portfolio.
FeaturesSection.feature1Description: Built with Next.js 15 and optimized for performance. Your users will love the speed.
FeaturesSection.feature2Description: Authentication, authorization, and data protection built-in with industry best practices.
FeaturesSection.feature3Description: Built-in team management, permissions, and collaboration tools for growing businesses.
FeaturesSection.feature4Description: Comprehensive analytics and reporting to understand your users and grow your business.

SocialProofSection.heading: Loved by Builders Worldwide
SocialProofSection.testimonial1Content: FinHome helped us understand exactly what we could afford and plan our home purchase timeline. We bought our first home with confidence!
SocialProofSection.testimonial2Content: The code quality is exceptional and the documentation is crystal clear. Highly recommended!
SocialProofSection.testimonial3Content: The financial scenarios and timeline visualization made it easy to compare different property investments. Great tool for planning!

CTASection.heading: Ready to Start Your Real Estate Journey?
CTASection.description: Join thousands of entrepreneurs who have already built successful businesses with our template.
